summary.span: 提供游標模型來巡覽及編輯 XML 資料。

span.span: Provides a cursor model for navigating and editing XML data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別命名空間是抽象類別會定義資料指標模型瀏覽及編輯 XML 資訊項目為 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 資料模型執行個體。The class in the namespace is an abstract class which defines a cursor model for navigating and editing XML information items as instances of the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model. 實作的類別，從建立物件這類介面和類別。An object is created from a class that implements the interface such as the and classes. 所建立的物件物件處於唯讀狀態時所建立的物件物件可以進行編輯。 objects created by objects are read-only while objects created by objects can be edited. 物件的唯讀或可編輯的狀態用來決定屬性類別。An object's read-only or editable status is determined using the property of the class. 如需有關如何處理使用 XPath 資料模型的 XML 資料的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 XPath 資料模型處理 XML 資料](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md)主題。For more information about processing XML data using the XPath data model, see the [Process XML Data Using the XPath Data Model](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md) topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用所引發的例外狀況類別，例如類別中，可能包含不應該公開受信任的案例中的機密資訊。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 使機密資訊不會出現在受信任的案例，就應該正確地處理例外狀況。Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios.

summary.span: 傳回 物件，該物件可用來在目前節點的子節點清單結尾建立一或多個新的子節點。

span.span: Returns an object used to create one or more new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.

returns.span: 物件，用來在目前節點的子節點清單結尾建立新的子節點。

span.span: An object used to create new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將子節點附加至目前節點的子節點清單結尾加入新節點。Appending child nodes adds the new nodes to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，當三個子節點存在的項目時，第一個附加的節點就會變成第四個子節點。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the first appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 新的子節點不會插入直到方法稱為物件。The new child node is not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 方法時才有效唯一位於根節點或項目節點。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . 您可以撰寫一個以上的節點至寫入器。You can write more than one node to the writer. 所有的節點會附加至目前節點的子節點清單的結尾。All nodes are appended to the end of the list of child nodes of the current node. ## Examples 在下列範例中，新`pages`子項目會附加到的第一個子項目清單`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用從傳回的物件方法。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#1)] 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的子節點將新節點加入至目前節點的子節點清單的結尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，當三個子節點存在的項目時，附加的節點就會變成第四個子節點。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 若要建立新的項目節點，包含所有的 XML 語法中的 XML 字串參數。To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter. 新的字串`book`節點是`AppendChild("")`。The string for a new `book` node is `AppendChild("")`. 將 「 書籍 」 的文字附加至目前節點的文字節點的字串是`AppendChild("book")`。The string for appending the text "book" to the current node's text node is `AppendChild("book")`. 如果 XML 字串包含多個節點，加入所有節點。If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法時才有效唯一位於根節點或項目節點。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下列範例中，會將新的 `pages` 項目子系附加至 `book` 檔案中第一個 `contosoBooks.xml` 項目的項目子系清單。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#2)] 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的子節點將新節點加入至目前節點的子節點清單的結尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，當三個子節點存在的項目時，附加的節點就會變成第四個子節點。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果物件位於 XML 節點的序列，會加入序列中的所有節點。If the object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added. - 方法時才有效唯一位於根節點或項目節點。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下列範例中，新`pages`子項目會附加到的第一個子項目清單`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用指定的物件。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object specified. `http://www.contoso.com/books`指定命名空間，如此新的子項目會以 XML 文件使用相同的命名空間。The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new child element is appended using the same namespace as the XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的子節點將新節點加入至目前節點的子節點清單的結尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，當項目節點的三個子節點存在，附加的節點會變成第四個子節點。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element node, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 命名空間前置詞和 URI 值可以使用來取得方法或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the method or the method. 比方說，下列語法將附加的子元素所使用的範圍內的命名空間`xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`:For example, the following syntax appends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`: ``` navigator.AppendChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 這會建立新的子系``項目。This creates the new child `` element. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空間前置詞是`null`或，則新項目的 URI 的命名空間的前置詞取自目前命名空間範圍內。If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or , then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果沒有指派給指定的命名空間 URI 在目前範圍內沒有命名空間前置詞，會自動產生的命名空間前置詞。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated. - 方法時才有效唯一位於根節點或項目節點。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下列範例中，會將新的 `pages` 項目子系附加至 `book` 檔案中第一個 `contosoBooks.xml` 項目的項目子系清單。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. span.span: The location from which the node was loaded, or if there is no value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網路的 XML 文件的使用各種 W3C 標準包含機制，彙總的資料區塊組成，因此包含來自不同位置的節點。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data, aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms, and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. DTD 實體是範例，此彙總的資料，但不限於 Dtd。DTD entities are an example of this aggregated data, but it is not limited to DTDs. 屬性會告訴您這些節點是來自。The property tells you where these nodes originate from. 例如，如果 XML 資料從載入http://server/mydata.xml、屬性會傳回http://server/mydata.xml。For example, if the XML data is loaded from http://server/mydata.xml, the property returns http://server/mydata.xml. > [!NOTE] > 使用所建立的節點類別具有相同以 XML 文件從已建立。Nodes created using the class have the same as the XML document the was created from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 方法會驗證 XML 資料包含在必須符合全域型別或結構描述或結構描述中所提供的宣告。The method verifies that the XML data contained in the conforms to a global type or declaration in the schema or schemas provided in the . - 方法不會執行資訊集增加。The method does not perform infoset augmentation. 這表示，不會套用結構描述預設值、 文字值不會轉換成原子值，而且沒有新的型別資訊與相關聯的資訊項目。This means that schema defaults are not applied, text values are not converted to atomic values, and no new type information is associated with information items. - 結構描述`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`XML 資料中的提示都會被忽略。Schema `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` hints in the XML data of are ignored. - 如果位於文件節點上，驗證程序包括檢查唯一性和參考條件約束 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，和`xs:unique`)。If the is positioned on a document node, the validation process includes checking of uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`). 否則，會省略這些檢查。Otherwise, these checks are omitted. - 如果參數形式傳遞`null`和位於項目節點，所公開的型別資訊屬性的屬性用來檢查節點的有效性。If the passed as a parameter is `null` and the is positioned on an element node, the type information exposed by the property's property is used to check the node's validity. 如果參數形式傳遞`null`和位於根節點，使用文件項目 （也就是項目子系的根節點） 的屬性。If the passed as a parameter is `null` and the is positioned on the root node, the property of the document element (that is, the element child of the root node) is used. 在這兩種情況下如果屬性的項目屬性是`null`和參數形式傳遞`null`、會擲回因為用來執行任何類型資訊驗證。In both cases if the property of the element's property is `null` and the passed as a parameter is `null`, an is thrown because there is no type information to use to perform validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述列舉型別。The following table describes the enumeration. |XmlNodeOrderXmlNodeOrder|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||目前的節點之前所提供的目前節點。The current node of this is before the current node of the supplied .| ||目前的節點之後所提供的目前節點。The current node of this is after the current node of the supplied .| ||這兩個物件位於相同節點上。The two objects are positioned on the same node.| ||節點位置無法決定相對於其他文件順序或`null`指定為參數。The node positions cannot be determined relative to each other in the document order, or `null` is specified as the parameter. 如果兩個節點位於不同的樹狀結構中，就會發生這種情況。This could occur if the two nodes reside in different trees.| 方法的行為會視目前所在。The method's behavior is dependent on the the is currently positioned on. 當比較 XML 文件中的節點時，適用下列規則：When comparing nodes in the XML document, the following rules apply: - 節點： 這些節點會傳回文件順序，將來源文件。 nodes: These nodes are returned in document order from the source document. - 節點： 這些節點可能會傳回文件順序，而且一律先父項目的節點。 nodes: These nodes may be returned in document order and are always before the nodes of the parent element. - 節點： 這些節點可能會傳回文件順序。 nodes: These nodes may be returned in document order. 一律後面出現節點、 父節點的任何子節點之前。They always come after the nodes and before any child nodes of the parent node. > [!NOTE] > 為 XPath 資料模型的詳細資訊，以及每個節點類型的詳細資料，請參閱 W3C XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 之建議事項第 5 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。For more information about the XPath data model and details about each of the node types, see section 5 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model. 這個方法沒有任何作用狀態的。This method has no effect on the state of the . > [!NOTE] > 使用方法而非盡可能的方法。Use the method rather than the method when possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間前置詞和 URI 值可透過使用或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the or method. 例如，下列語法會建立的屬性使用範圍內的命名空間`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:For example, the following syntax creates an attribute by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` editor.CreateAttribute(navigator.Prefix, "attributeName", LookupNamespace(navigator.Prefix), "text") ``` 這會建立新屬性``上目前的項目。This creates the new attribute `` on the current element. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空間前置詞是或`null`，命名空間 URI 的新屬性的前置詞取自目前命名空間範圍內。If the namespace prefix specified is or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果沒有指派給指定的命名空間 URI 在目前範圍內沒有命名空間前置詞，會自動產生的命名空間前置詞。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated. 例如若要建立新屬性的預設命名空間中的項目上`contosoBooks.xml`檔案 (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`)，您指定`null`或命名空間前置詞和命名空間 URI 參數。For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters. 指定`http://www.contoso.com/books`做為命名空間 URI 參數將會造成方法，以自動產生新屬性的命名空間前置詞。Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute. - 建立新屬性是與命名空間宣告項目可能衝突，因為另一個命名空間宣告，在相同範圍中，使用選擇的命名空間前置詞的命名空間節點，或因為選擇的前置詞的相同項目，但是繫結至不同的命名空間 URI，會擲回例外狀況。If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown. - 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下列範例中，新`discount`上建立屬性`price`的第一個子項目`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案。In the following example, a new `discount` attribute is created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#7)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#7)] 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 當位於項目時，所建立的新屬性上方法會放置在目前的項目之屬性清單的結尾。When the is positioned on an element, the new attributes created by the method are placed at the end of the attribute list of the current element. - 新的屬性則不會插入直到方法稱為物件。The new attributes are not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 如果指定的命名空間前置詞是或`null`，命名空間 URI 的新屬性的前置詞取自目前命名空間範圍內。If the namespace prefix specified is or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果沒有指派給指定的命名空間 URI 在目前範圍內沒有命名空間前置詞，會自動產生的命名空間前置詞。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated. 例如若要建立新屬性的預設命名空間中的項目上`contosoBooks.xml`檔案 (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`)，您指定`null`或命名空間前置詞和命名空間 URI 參數。For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters. 指定`http://www.contoso.com/books`做為命名空間 URI 參數將會造成方法，以自動產生新屬性的命名空間前置詞。Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute. - 建立新屬性是與命名空間宣告項目可能衝突，因為另一個命名空間宣告，在相同範圍中，使用選擇的命名空間前置詞的命名空間節點，或因為選擇的前置詞的相同項目，但是繫結至不同的命名空間 URI，會擲回例外狀況。If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown. - 傳回的物件可能只用於建立屬性。The object returned may only be used to create attributes. 呼叫其他不建立屬性的物件方法會擲回的例外狀況。Calling other object methods that do not create attributes throws an exception. - 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下列範例中，會使用從 `discount` 方法傳回的 `currency` 物件，在 `price` 檔案中第一個 `book` 項目的 `contosoBooks.xml` 項目子系上，建立新的 及 屬性。In the following example, new `discount` and `currency` attributes are created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. summary.span: 刪除目前的節點和它的子節點。

span.span: Deletes the current node and its child nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 位於上成功刪除已刪除的節點的父節點上。The is positioned on the deleted node's parent node on successful deletion. - 如果刪除的節點是文字節點內容的簡單型別項目，項目會失去其類型資訊。If the deleted node is a text node which is the content of a simple typed element, the element loses its type information. 這表示當項目上放置，和屬性有值`null`，和分別。This means that when positioned on the element the , and properties have the values `null`, and respectively. - 已刪除的節點都仍可存取位於它們在刪除前的物件。Deleted nodes are still accessible to objects positioned over them prior to deletion. 不過，嘗試將移開刪除的樹狀子目錄方法都會失敗。However methods that attempt to move away from the deleted sub-tree fail. 例如，和方法一律會失敗位於最已刪除的最上層節點。For example, the and methods always fail when the is positioned over the top most deleted node. 這是因為已刪除的節點無法再連接至 XML 文件。This is because the deleted node is no longer connected to the XML document. 同樣地方法一律會失敗如果位於最下方的已刪除節點上。Similarly the method always fails if the is positioned on the bottom-most deleted node. ## Examples 在下列範例中`price`的第一個項目`book`元素`contosoBooks.xml`使用刪除檔案方法。In the following example the `price` element of the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file is deleted using the method. 刪除 項目之後，`price` 物件的位置在父 `book` 項目上。The position of the object after the `price` element is deleted is on the parent `book` element. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#9)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#9)] 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果物件位於 XML 節點的序列，會加入序列中的所有節點。If the object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added. - 方法時才有效唯一定位於項目、 文字、 處理指示或註解節點上。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node. - 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下列範例中新`pages`項目插入後`price`的第一個子項目`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用指定的物件。In the following example a new `pages` element is inserted after the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object specified. `http://www.contoso.com/books`指定命名空間，如此新的同層級項目插入使用相同的命名空間的 XML 文件。The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new sibling element is inserted using the same namespace as the XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會以反向的文件順序傳回命名空間節點。The class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order. 因此， 實際上會移至目前範圍中的最後一個命名空間節點。Therefore, essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope. 使用下列 XML 片段為例，如果位於`data` 節點，以下列方式運作。Using the following XML fragment as an example, if the is positioned on the `data` node, behaves in the following manner. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` 移至下列命名空間節點的其中一個： `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`， `xmlns:b='B'`，或`xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, or `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` 移至下列命名空間節點的其中一個： `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`，或`xmlns:b='B'`。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, or `xmlns:b='B'`. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` 移至`xmlns:c='C'`節點。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` moves to the `xmlns:c='C'` node. ``` ``` 如果不目前所在的項目，這個方法會傳回`false`和位置不會變更。If the is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the does not change. 之後已移至命名空間節點，屬性會反映的命名空間名稱。After the has been moved to the namespace node, the property reflects the name of the namespace. 當命名空間節點，方法位於， ，和不適用。When the is positioned on a namespace node, the methods , , and are not applicable. 這些方法一律會傳回`false`，不會變更的位置。These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the . 相反地，您可以呼叫移至下一個命名空間節點。Rather, you can call to move to the next namespace node. 之後位於命名空間節點上，呼叫將移回至項目節點。After the is positioned on an namespace node, call to move back to the element node. 如需定義的命名空間節點，請參閱 W3C XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 之建議事項的 5.4 節位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model。For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 方法不會移動到屬性或命名空間節點。The method does not move to attribute or namespace nodes. 如果參數值是或、方法會傳回`false`和位置保持不變。If the parameter value is or , the method returns `false` and the position of the is unchanged. - 如果界限做為參數傳遞不位於目前的位置之後則會忽略它。If the boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current it is ignored. - 如果做為參數傳遞的界限是`null`下一步 以指定下列節點位於文件順序。If boundary passed as a parameter is `null` the next following node with the specified is located in document order. - 方法無法用來將移到屬性或命名空間節點。The methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes. 如果傳遞參數是否位於屬性或命名空間節點上的界限，它相當於界限參數具有已位於其父項目的第一個子節點。If the boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element. 如此可確保屬性或命名空間節點的父項目，位於界限參數上，可以比對這個方法。This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method. - 如果方法會傳回`false`，位置保持不變。If the method returns `false`, the position of the is unchanged. ## Examples 在下列範例中，移動的根目錄`contosoBooks.xml`檔案下的`price`項目。In the following example, the is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the following `price` element. 複製品物件則會使用方法。A clone of the object is made using the method. 複製、 位於`price`項目，將作為界限。The cloned , positioned on the `price` element, will be used as a boundary. 複製的位置變更不會影響原始。Changes in the position of the cloned do not affect the original . 原始會移回至根目錄的`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用方法。The original is moved back to the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the method. 第一個和最後一個名稱作者與標題會使用擷取方法和的。The title and first and last name of the author are retrieved using the method and an of . 方法會傳回 true，直到`price`項目界限為止。The method will return true until the `price` element boundary is reached. remarks.format: ## Remarks - 如果界限做為參數傳遞不位於目前的位置之後則會忽略它。If the boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current it is ignored. - 如果界限參數是`null`，具有區域名稱和命名空間 URI，指定下列項目位於文件順序。If the boundary parameter is `null`, the following element with the local name and namespace URI specified is located in document order. - 方法無法用來將移到屬性或命名空間節點。The methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes. 如果傳遞參數是否位於屬性或命名空間節點上的界限，它相當於界限參數具有已位於其父項目的第一個子節點。If the boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element. 如此可確保屬性或命名空間節點的父項目，位於界限參數上，可以比對這個方法。This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method. - 如果方法會傳回`false`，位置保持不變。If the method returns `false`, the position of the is unchanged. ## Examples 在下列範例中，移動的根目錄`contosoBooks.xml`檔案下的`book`項目。In the following example, the is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the following `book` element. 複製品物件則會使用方法以及從移`book`下的項目`first-name`項目。A clone of the object is made using the method and is moved from the `book` element to the following `first-name` element. 複製、 位於`first-name`項目，將作為界限。The cloned , positioned on the `first-name` element, will be used as a boundary. 複製的位置變更不會影響原始。Changes in the position of the cloned do not affect the original . 原始嘗試移動下列`price`項目使用與界限的方法做為參數傳遞。The original then attempts to move to the following `price` element using the method with the boundary passed as a parameter. 此移動將會失敗，因為下列`price`項目超出界限。This move fails because the following `price` element is beyond the boundary. 原始嘗試移動下列`title`其之前的界限使用的相同方式，並成功的項目。The original then attempts to move to the following `title` element which is before the boundary using the same method and succeeds. remarks.format: ## Remarks 前面加上的子節點將新節點加入至目前節點的子節點清單開頭。Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，當三個子節點存在的項目，預留的節點會成為第一個子節點。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node. 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 新的子節點不會插入直到方法稱為物件。The new child node is not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 方法時才有效唯一定位於項目節點上。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element node. - 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下列範例中，新`pages`子元素之前的第一個子項目清單的開頭加上`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案使用從傳回的物件方法。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. span.span: Creates a new child element at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the namespace prefix, local name, and namespace URI specified with the value specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前面加上的子節點將新節點加入至目前節點的子節點清單開頭。Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，當三個子節點存在的項目，預留的節點會成為第一個子節點。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node. 如果沒有子節點存在，則會建立新的子節點。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 命名空間前置詞和 URI 值可以使用來取得或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the or method. 例如，下列語法會附加的子元素之前使用的範圍內的命名空間`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:For example, the following syntax prepends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.PrependChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 這會建立新的子系``項目。This creates the new child `` element. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空間前置詞是`null`或，則新項目的 URI 的命名空間的前置詞取自目前命名空間範圍內。If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or , then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果沒有指派給指定的命名空間 URI 在目前範圍內沒有命名空間前置詞，會自動產生的命名空間前置詞。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated. - 方法時才有效唯一定位於項目節點上。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element node. - 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下列範例中，新`pages`子元素之前的第一個子項目清單的開頭加上`book`中的項目`contosoBooks.xml`檔案。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#34)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#34)] 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取範圍的內容是位置當呼叫此方法。The context for the selection is the position of the when this method is called. 呼叫這個方法後,傳回代表所選取節點集。After calling this method, the returned represents the set of selected nodes. 使用方法至選定的節點集反覆查看。Use method of the to iterate over the selected node set. 下列 C# 程式碼會逐一選取的節點集。The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes. ``` XPathNodeIterator iterator = nav.Select("/bookstore/book"); while (iterator.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(Iterator.Current.Name); } ``` 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 您仍然可以使用任一內移動物件的巡覽方法。You can still use any of the object's navigation methods to move within the . 導覽方法無關的所選節點在。The navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the . - 未來呼叫方法都會傳回新指向選定節點集符合新物件呼叫。Future calls to the method return a new object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new call. 這兩個物件都是彼此完全獨立。The two objects are completely independent of each other. - 如果 XPath 運算式需要命名空間解析，請使用多載，這個方法會接受做為其引數。If the XPath expression requires namespace resolution, use the overload, which takes an as its argument. - 這個方法沒有任何作用狀態的。This method has no effect on the state of the . ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來選取節點集。The following example uses the method to select a node set. remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取範圍的內容是位置呼叫這個方法的時機。The context for the selection is the position of the when you called this method. 呼叫這個方法之後,傳回代表所選取節點集。After you call this method, the returned represents the set of selected nodes. 使用上至選定的節點集反覆查看。Use on the to iterate over the selected node set. 下列 C# 程式碼會逐一選取的節點集。The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes. ``` XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); while (ni.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(ni.Current.Name); } ``` 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 您仍然可以使用任一內移動物件的巡覽方法。You can still use any of the object's navigation methods to move within the . 導覽方法無關的所選節點在。The navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the . - 未來呼叫方法都會傳回新指向選定節點集符合新物件呼叫。Future calls to the method return a new object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new call. 這兩個物件都是彼此完全獨立。The two objects are completely independent of each other. - 如果需要必須加入命名空間解析的前置詞和命名空間 URI 配對，而必須呼叫方法，來指定用於命名空間解析。If the requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to an , and the method must be called to specify the to use for namespace resolution. 例如，假設文件包含下列的 XML 節點。For example, suppose the document contains the following XML nodes. ``` Pride And Prejudice ``` 下列 C# 程式碼會在此情況下，選取`bk:ISBN`節點。In this case, the following C# code selects the `bk:ISBN` node. ``` XPathExpression expr = nav.Compile("book/@bk:ISBN"); XmlNamespaceManager mngr = new XmlNamespaceManager(new NameTable()); mngr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples"); expr.SetContext(mngr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果不包含前置詞，則會假設命名空間 URI 為空白的命名空間。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace. 如果您的 XML 包含預設命名空間，您仍然必須使用方法，並提供包含前置詞和命名空間來處理的預設命名空間 URI。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. 例如，假設您有下列的 XML。For example, suppose you have the following XML. ``` Pride And Prejudice ``` 在此情況下，下列 C# 程式碼會選取所有書籍節點：In this case, the following C# code selects all book nodes: ``` XmlNamespaceManager nsmgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nav.NameTable); nsmgr.AddNamespace("ab", "http://www.lucernepublishing.com"); XPathExpression expr; expr = nav.Compile("//ab:book"); expr.SetContext(nsmgr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` 這個方法沒有任何作用狀態的。This method has no effect on the state of the . ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來選取節點集。The following example uses the method to select a node set. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#40)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#40)] 範例將 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會選取符合指定的 XPath 查詢的第一個節點。The method selects the first node that matches the XPath query specified. 方法會使用來解析命名空間前置詞的物件。The method uses the object to resolve namespace prefixes. > [!NOTE] > 在 XPath 中的所有命名空間前置字元必須是在查詢中。In XPath all namespaces must be prefixed in a query. 如果 XML 文件會使用預設命名空間，您仍然必須新增的命名空間前置詞物件。If an XML document uses a default namespace, you must still add a namespace prefix to the object. ## Examples 下列範例會選取單一節點從物件會根據指定的 XPath 查詢，並使用指定用來解析 XPath 查詢中的命名空間前置詞的物件。The following example selects a single node from the object based on the XPath query specified and uses the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes in the XPath query. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#45](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#45)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#45)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#45)] 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可由實作提供 「 虛擬化 」 的 XML 檢視上的存放區，以提供存取基礎物件。The property can be used by implementations which provide a "virtualized" XML view over a store, to provide access to underlying objects. 例如，如果物件可用來透過 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 物件圖形中提供虛擬的 XML 檢視，您可能想要執行使用 XPath 查詢方法，然後存取所選的節點的 CLR 物件。For example, if an object is used to provide a virtual XML view over a Common Language Runtime (CLR) object graph, you may wish to perform XPath queries using the method and then access the CLR objects underlying the selected nodes. 屬性會公開這些基礎物件。The property would expose these underlying objects. 在許多情況下，這個值會是`null`，所傳回的物件和屬性一定會是特定的實作。In many cases, this value will be `null`, and the object returned by the property will always be implementation specific. 屬性應該保留物件身分識別，並只應該用來傳回具有一對一的對應關係，其各自的覆疊項目的物件。The property should preserve object identity and should only be used to return objects that have a one-to-one correspondence to their respective overlaid items. 使用者應該有相同的物件相同的節點使用相同的後續造訪物件或複製的其中一個。A user should always get the same object on successive visits to the same node using the same object or a cloned one. > [!NOTE] > 屬性所建立的物件物件傳回對應。The property of an object created by an object returns the corresponding .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有結構描述或型別資訊 (例如，從物件與 XML 結構描述驗證初始化)，如果目前的節點定義為 XML 結構描述和`xs:boolean`型別，屬性傳回目前節點的值，成為 unboxed物件。If the has schema or type information (for example, from an object initialized with an XML schema validating ), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:boolean` type, the property returns the current node's value as an unboxed object. 不過，如果並沒有任何結構描述或型別資訊，屬性會嘗試將目前節點的字串值值，根據 XPath 2.0 轉換規則，如`xs:boolean`。However, if the does not have any schema or type information, the property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:boolean`. ## Examples 在下列範例中，在每個項目的值`valueas.xml`檔案會使用傳回， ， ， ，和屬性。In the following example, the value of each element in the `valueas.xml` file is returned using the , , , , and properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有結構描述或型別資訊 (例如，從物件與 XML 結構描述驗證初始化)，如果目前的節點定義為 XML 結構描述和`xs:integer`型別，屬性傳回目前節點的值，成為 unboxed物件。If the has schema or type information (for example, from an object initialized with an XML schema validating ), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:integer` type, the property returns the current node's value as an unboxed object. 不過，如果並沒有任何結構描述或型別資訊，屬性會嘗試將目前節點的字串值值，根據 XPath 2.0 轉換規則，如`xs:integer`。However, if the does not have any schema or type information, the property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:integer`. ## Examples 如需屬性，請參閱屬性。For an example of the property, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得.NET Framework的目前節點的具類型值。The property gets the .NET Framework of the typed value of the current node. 例如，類型的元素`xs:int`必須的預設。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 不過，可以是任何一種可以對應到有效型別`xs:int`例如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int` such as or . 如果節點沒有類型，這相當於類型上的註解節點`xdt:untypedAtomic`。If a node has no type, this is equivalent to the type annotation on the node being `xdt:untypedAtomic`. 在此情況下，屬性會傳回節點的字串。In this case, the property returns a string for the node. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md). ## Examples 在下列範例中， `contosoBooks.xml` XML 檔案和`contosoBooks.xsd`XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述用來建立物件。In the following example, the `contosoBooks.xml` XML file and `contosoBooks.xsd` XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema are used to create an object. 具類型的值`price`項目會顯示使用屬性，然後傳回做為字串，使用方法。The typed value of the `price` element is displayed using the property and then returned as a string using the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CPP/xpathnavigatorproperties.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CS/xpathnavigatorproperties.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/VB/xpathnavigatorproperties.vb#6)] 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ``` 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前節點的範圍內的命名空間的命名空間宣告會插入到 XML 資料流處理至指定的物件。Namespace declarations for the in-scope namespaces of the current node are inserted into the XML streamed to the object specified. 比方說，如果方法呼叫的第一`book`元素`books.xml`檔案，`http://www.contoso.com/books`命名空間宣告在 XML 文件頂端會出現在 XML 資料流處理至指定的物件下列範例所示。For example, if the method is called on the first `book` element of the `books.xml` file, the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace declaration made at the top of the XML document will appear in the XML streamed to the object specified as shown in the following example. ``` The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 ``` > [!NOTE] > 方法不會影響的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用方法在第一個`book`元素`contosoBooks.xml`檔案。The following example illustrates using the method on the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#48)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#48)] 範例將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```
